channel.title: How to Axoloti to Din Sync
channel.description:
It should be possible to sync my Tr606 from the Axoloti......but how? My goal is to shuffle the Din Sync..... I know, there must be some external circuits.... But how to patch , especially how to groove DINSync And how to make a working circuit?
I think we need a trigger burst object for shuffling...
Any ideas?

item.title: How to Axoloti to Din Sync
item.dc:creator: @fma matthew Allen
item.description:
@fma wrote:

I havent had a 606 for a long time (pre hardware hacking) but page 3 on this guy shows what data is being sent through the DIN cable to the 606:

http://privat.bahnhof.se/wb447909/dinsync/service_manuals/TR-606.pdf

Specifically:

You would need to send +5v to the appropriate input to cause the machine to trigger.

This thread is your best friend for input/Output on the board

Official pin out/ports documentation

here is my nonofficial gpio I/O port overview. edited 31.12.2015 [image] Download

And this post by @johannes actually has a couple of simple circuit diagrams!

Official pin out/ports documentation

Some circuit templates to connect potentiometers, switches, sensors: [image]

Good luck and keep us posted!

Read full topic
item.source: How to Axoloti to Din Sync
